name: Gateway Shift - Ramin Amiri #101190944
description:
Match your color with the walls before you to pass them, while jumping over obstacles at the same time!

If you don't mess up, you build up a combo which lets you earn a score multiplier to get a higher score.

How to play the game is an available scene in the game. Have fun!

Created by Ramin Amiri #101190944
